sections.heading: Disposition of undivided shareA co-owner may freely lease, alienate, or encumber his share of the thing held in indivision
sections.text: The consent of all the co-owners is required for the lease, alienation, or encumbrance of the entire thing held in indivision.Acts 1990, No. 990, ยง1, eff. Jan. 1, 1991.
